page.title: 01LONGFORGAN AND ENVIRONS "I"
page.content: Longforgan is situated 8 miles West of Dundee city centre on the South side of the A85 Dundee-Perth dual carriageway. The village is situated with the River Tay to the South and the hills of Fife are seen beyond the river, while to the North are the Braes of the Carse and beyond into Angus and the Sidlaw Hills. The village is now to a large extent a dormitory village for people working in Dundee and surrounding districts, and for pupils attending secondary school in Dundee. The village is served by public transport although a large percentage of commuters use private transport. Perth is also easily reached and provides a pleasant alternative for shoppers. Longforgan was designated a Conservation Area in 1976.
